slides.title: The Missed Call Problem

content.headline: How Many Calls Did You Miss Today?

stats.missed_calls: 62% of calls to small businesses go unanswered

slides.narration: How many calls did you miss today? Here's a sobering stat: sixty-two percent of calls to small businesses go unanswered. And eighty-five percent of those callers won't call back. They call your competitor instead. Every missed call is potentially lost revenue. What if your phone could answer itself?

slides.title: Voice AI: Your Always-On Receptionist
slides.narration: Voice AI is your always-on receptionist. It answers every call, twenty-four seven, no hold times. It sounds natural—conversational, not robotic. It handles common questions: hours, location, services, pricing. It takes messages with accurate transcription sent to you. It books appointments directly on your calendar. And it transfers when needed—urgent calls get routed to you immediately.

slides.title: How It Sounds

content.headline: Natural, Professional, On-Brand

sample_conversation.caller: Hi, I'm looking for information about your services
sample_conversation.ai: Hi! Thanks for calling [Business]. I'd be happy to help. Are you interested in [Service A] or [Service B]?
sample_conversation.caller: Service A. What are your prices?
sample_conversation.ai: Great choice. [Service A] starts at [price]. Would you like to schedule a consultation, or do you have other questions I can help with?

content.note: Customize greeting, personality, and responses to match your brand

slides.narration: Here's how it actually sounds. Caller says: 'Hi, I'm looking for information about your services.' AI responds: 'Hi! Thanks for calling [your business]. I'd be happy to help. Are you interested in [Service A] or [Service B]?' Natural. Professional. On-brand. You customize the greeting, the personality, and the responses. It sounds like your business, not a generic robot.

slides.title: When AI Hands Off to You

content.headline: AI Knows When to Transfer
content.control: You set the rules. AI follows them.

slides.narration: AI knows when to transfer to you. Caller requests a human? Immediate transfer. Complex question AI can't answer? Takes a message and alerts you. High-value opportunity detected? Priority notification. Emergency or urgent? Direct transfer. VIP caller recognized? Custom handling. You set the rules. AI follows them. You stay in control while AI handles the volume.

slides.title: The Math

content.headline: Voice AI vs. Missed Calls vs. Hiring

slides.narration: Let's look at the math. Option one: miss calls. Costs zero, but you're losing five hundred to five thousand a month in missed opportunities. Option two: hire a receptionist. Twenty-five hundred to four thousand a month for about forty hours of coverage. Option three: Voice AI. Ninety-nine to two ninety-nine a month for twenty-four seven, three-sixty-five coverage. Every call answered. Fraction of the cost.
